title: Homeland security an untapped market for satellite imagery and analytics
summary: Commercial imaging satellites and change detection analysis have emerged as powerful tools increasingly employed by national security agencies. But the potential of this technology has yet to be exploited for U.S. homeland defense, officials said May 23.

title: Satellite Vu raised $15.8 million for thermal satellite constellation
summary: British Earth observation startup Satellite Vu raised 12.7 million British pounds ($15.8 million) for its thermal satellite constellation.

title: Falcon 9 launch with Arabsat 7B scrubbed
summary: SpaceX was set to launch the Arabsat 7B satellite to geostationary transfer orbit (GTO) for Arabsat atop its Falcon 9 rocket. The launch ran through the entire window, before scrubbing with just three minutes to go in the countdown. SpaceX is likely make another attempt in 24 hours.

title: NGA plans new procurement of commercial Earth monitoring services
summary: The National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is planning a new procurement of commercial services to monitor activities from space.

title: Three companies to buy most Virgin Orbit assets
summary: Three aerospace companies submitted winning bids at a bankruptcy auction for most of the assets of launch company Virgin Orbit, ending any chance that company could return to flight under new ownership.

title: Virgin Orbit Sells Assets To RocketLab, Stratolaunch and Vast Launcher
summary: Virgin Orbit has sold its assets and equipment to a trio of aerospace companies through an auction, as confirmed by a court filing released on Tuesday.

title: Virgin Orbit shuts down after bankruptcy sales
summary: Bankrupt rocket company Virgin Orbit is shutting down after selling its facility leases and equipment to a trio of aerospace companies in an auction, the company confirmed on Tuesday.

title: NRO seeks closer ties with industry
summary: U.S. defense and intelligence agencies need to forge even closer ties with the commercial sector to address global security threats, said Chris Scolese, National Reconnaissance Office director.

title: Air Force Research Lab to fund development of Ursa Major’s rocket engines
summary: Rocket propulsion startup Ursa Major won a U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory contract to support the development of two of the company’s rocket engines.

title: The Spaceport Company Performs First Demo of Offshore Launch Ops
summary: The Spaceport Company has successfully demonstrated their capability to conduct launches from a floating platform in US territorial waters for the first time.
